extendedInfo.description: If you are Billy Talent's fan, this app is right for you. Whenever you want to check Billy Talent's lyrics, just open this app and choose the lyrics that you want. You don't have to access the internet to get the lyrics. We provide all Billy Talent's lyrics here. In the Album tab, you can choose lyrics based on the album. In All lyrics tab, all of Billy Talent's lyrics are here. You can quickly search the lyrics by using the search bar at the top of the page.Hope you guy enjoy using this app as much as I enjoy developing it. :)-------------------------------- Main Features -------------------------------- - Lyrics categorized by album - Show all lyrics - Search lyrics-------------------------------- List of albums -------------------------------- - Billy Talent- Billy Talent II- Billy Talent III- Dead Silence-------------------------------- List of lyrics -------------------------------- - Beachballs- Bloody Nails And Broken Hearts- Burn The Evidence- Covered In Cowardice- Crooked Minds- Cure For The Enemy- Cut The Curtains- Dead Silence- Definition Of Destiny- Devil In A Midnight Mass- Devil On My Shoulder- Diamond On A Landmine- Don't Count On The Wicked- Don't Need To Pretend- Ever Fallen In Love? (With Someone You Know You Shouldn't've)- Fallen Leaves- Hanging By A Thread- How It Goes- Lies- Line And Sinker- Living In The Shadows- Lonely Road To Absolution- Love Was Still Around- Man Alive!- Nothing To Lose- Perfect World- Pins And Needles- Pocketful Of Dreams- Prisoners Of Today- Red Flag- River Below- Running Across The Tracks- Rusted From The Rain- Saint Veronika- Show Me The Way- Stand Up And Run- Standing In The Rain- Sudden Movements- Surprise, Surprise- Surrender- Swallowed Up By The Ocean- Sympathy- Tears Into Wine- The Dead Can't Testify- The Ex- The Navy Song- This Suffering- Try Honesty- Turn Your Back- Viking Death March- Voices Of Violence- When I Was A Little Girl- Where Is The Line- White Sparrows- Worker Bees

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Here you are, posting lyrics on the worlds best band, and my favourite band, I am so dedicated I have all their albums, including Watoosh! And Dudebox and Demoluca, when they were called Pezz, but hen, you post and app that has lyrics for the worlds worst band on earth, 1 Direction. A European gay band:(
reviews.author: Keenan Smith

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: This is such a cool app! The only annoying thing is the adds I click without knowing. Other than that: cool app :)
reviews.author: Faye VD

reviews.title: Its meh
reviews.comment: Its slow on a smart phone but the best one i found is this
reviews.author: wyatt jenkins
